name: Naki
description:
Design a Clone


‣Create any clone imaginable

Gear Up


‣Buy gear from the Salesman or Scavenge your own pile of gear.
‣Customize your weapons to your personal preference and bring a bunch of ammo.


Fight for your life or die trying


‣Scavenge Zones are full of Military Automatons
‣They use heavy projectiles so staying out of range or dodging are your best options.

Scavenge and Extract with the loot


‣Take what you can from Scavenge Runs everything adds up.
‣Flares mark Extraction Points.
‣Hoard what you've scavenged or sell it all to the Salesman.

Discover the Lore


In a post apocalyptic future when the Annunaki came back to earth and destroyed civilization.
Humans developed cloning technology and started creating clones to scavenge the world.
You're mission is to scavenge what's left from the sectors and bring it back to the safezone.
Extractions are marked by flares, if you don't extract in time your clone will be terminated.
Kill anything that moves, trust me everything outside of the safezone can and will kill you.
Following suspicious objects could lead to secrets..
It's your experience. Naki allows you to play how you want to play.
